courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to graduate acting students; concurrent registration in THEA 571, THEA 573 and THEA 574.
description: Intensive professional training in voice and speech for the actor. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to graduate acting students; concurrent registration in THEA 571, THEA 573 and THEA 574.
label: Colloquium in Acting: Voice
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign. Restricted to MFA:Theatre (MFA-Acting) -UIUC.
